ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] System specs for Kunark
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the info! :)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Niomar [mailto:Niomar@...]
> Sent: Friday, April 07, 2000 3:22 PM
> To: EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] System specs for Kunark
>
>
> Don't quote me on this or anything, but if I remember right these are the
> specs...
>
> *Windows┬« 95 or Windows┬« 98
> *Pentium 233 (or greater)(Note older Model Cyrix processors WILL NOT WORK
> with EverQuest.)
> *64 MB RAM ( this may be 32, but I am pretty sure they doubled
> the required
> from orginal (which was 32)
> *Direct3D or Glide compliant card w/ 4MB RAM
> *28.8k bps Internet connection
> *Sound Blaster compatible soundcard
> *Microsoft compatible mouse
> *8x CD-ROM drive
>
> Bonecollecter, Cazic Server
>
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...>
